title: Battleground Breakdown: What You Need To Know About The 7 Swing States
content: "Swing states" - the elephant in the room is the major decider of the United States presidential election. Also known as battleground states, these states can make or break any candidate.
summary: "Swing states" - the elephant in the room is the major decider of the United States presidential election. Also known as battleground states, these states can make or break any candidate.

title: India Wants To Grow With World: EAM Jaishankar
content: Addressing the Indian community here, Mr. Jaishankar said: "India will grow. India is growing, but India wants to grow with the world."
summary: Addressing the Indian community here, Mr. Jaishankar said: "India will grow. India is growing, but India wants to grow with the world."

title: India And China Made 'Some Progress' In Disengagement, Says S Jaishankar
content: India and China have made "some progress" in disengagement, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said on Sunday, describing the development as a "welcome" step.
summary: India and China have made "some progress" in disengagement, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said on Sunday, describing the development as a "welcome" step.

title: Kamala Harris, Donald Trump Race Against Time In Final Swing State Push
content: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump began a frantic last push across US swing states Sunday, with less than 48 hours of campaigning left to secure a decisive edge in a bitterly fought and historically close presidential election.
summary: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump began a frantic last push across US swing states Sunday, with less than 48 hours of campaigning left to secure a decisive edge in a bitterly fought and historically close presidential election.

title: Watch: Harris Makes Surprise Appearance On SNL As Election Heats Up
content: Vice President Kamala Harris made a surprise appearance on "Saturday Night Live" just days before the election, playing herself alongside Maya Rudolph's impression of her.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris made a surprise appearance on "Saturday Night Live" just days before the election, playing herself alongside Maya Rudolph's impression of her.

title: Spain's King And PM Attacked With Mud During Visit To Flood Hit Valencia
content: Furious locals pelted Spain's royals and premier on Sunday with mud and cries of "murderers!", forcing officials to cut short their visit to the town worst hit by the floods which have killed more than 200.
summary: Furious locals pelted Spain's royals and premier on Sunday with mud and cries of "murderers!", forcing officials to cut short their visit to the town worst hit by the floods which have killed more than 200.

title: Israeli Strikes In Gaza Kill 23 Amid Intensified Northern Offensive
content: Israeli forces stepped up bombardment of the Gaza Strip on Sunday killing at least 23 people, Palestinian medics said, with over half the deaths in northern areas where the army has waged a month-long campaign.
summary: Israeli forces stepped up bombardment of the Gaza Strip on Sunday killing at least 23 people, Palestinian medics said, with over half the deaths in northern areas where the army has waged a month-long campaign.

title: Police Rush To American Airlines Flight After Mysterious Mid-Air Noise
content: An American Airlines flight from Buenos Aires to New York was forced to return after a strange "banging noise" at 30,000 feet, sparking fears of a possible person trapped in the cargo hold.
summary: An American Airlines flight from Buenos Aires to New York was forced to return after a strange "banging noise" at 30,000 feet, sparking fears of a possible person trapped in the cargo hold.

title: US Election: Gaza Emerges As Top Issue For Many New York Muslims
content: Muslim American voters in New York, like their counterparts nationwide, are increasingly prioritising the Gaza crisis in their voting decisions for the upcoming presidential election.

title: Biden Suggests He'd Like To Smack 'Macho Guys' During Final Campaign Stop
content: Biden slammed Harris' rival, former Republican President Donald Trump, and his supporters on policy issues during a speech in Scranton.

title: China Ramps Up Military Activity Around Taiwan, 37 Chinese Jets Detected
content: Taiwan said it detected 37 Chinese fighter jets, drones and other aircraft near the self-ruled island on Sunday as Beijing carried out "long-distance" training flights.
summary: Taiwan said it detected 37 Chinese fighter jets, drones and other aircraft near the self-ruled island on Sunday as Beijing carried out "long-distance" training flights.

title: India-US Partnership Most Important Globally For Future: Makhija
content: Makhija said it is very important that the next US president understands that India is a very crucial partner for the US in many ways.

title: Justin Trudeau's Diwali Video Amid Peak India-Canada Diplomatic Tensions

title: Israel Captures 'Senior Hezbollah Operative' In Lebanon Raid
content: Israeli naval commandos have seized a trainee mariner a military official described as a "senior operative" of Hezbollah in a raid in Lebanon and brought him to Israel for questioning.

title: From Peanut To Moo Deng, A Look At Internet's Favourite Celebrity Animals
content: Celebrity squirrel Peanut, who had been a beloved companion to owner Mark Longo for seven years, was recently euthanised along with a raccoon found in Mr Longo's care.
summary: Celebrity squirrel Peanut, who had been a beloved companion to owner Mark Longo for seven years, was recently euthanised along with a raccoon found in Mr Longo's care.

title: "South Korea's Yoon Raised Risk Of Nuclear War": North Korea
content: North Korean state media released a white paper on Sunday accusing South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol of exposing his country to the danger of nuclear war through his policies toward the North.

title: Pakistan Firm Apologises For Advertising "Scam" Halloween Parade In Dublin
content: A Pakistan-based company has issued an apology after mistakenly advertising a non-existent Halloween parade in Dublin, Ireland.

title: "Cesspools Of Blood", "Ganglands": Donald Trump's Assessment of US Cities
content: Trump has targeted cities like Chicago, Washington, D.C., and Atlanta, referring to them as “cesspools of blood, as per a New York Times report.

title: Who Is Kemi Badenoch, Conservative Party's First Black Leader In UK
content: Kemi Badenoch has secured a resounding victory in the Conservative Party leadership contest, making her the first black woman to lead a major political party in the United Kingdom.

title: "Mindless, Heartless": Elon Musk After Celebrity Squirrel's Euthanasia
content: Elon Musk has criticised the Joe Biden administration, labelling it a "mindless and heartless killing machine" following the euthanasia of Peanut, the internet-famous squirrel confiscated by New York state officials.
summary: Elon Musk has criticised the Joe Biden administration, labelling it a "mindless and heartless killing machine" following the euthanasia of Peanut, the internet-famous squirrel confiscated by New York state officials.
